trans-unit.source: A custom field to insert a section headline.
trans-unit.target: In champ per inserir in titel per ina secziun

trans-unit.source: A custom field to insert an explanation text.
trans-unit.target: In champ per inserir in text cun ina decleraziun.

trans-unit.source: A custom field to insert HTML code.
trans-unit.target: In champ per inserir code da HTML

trans-unit.source: A container for form fields with an optional legend (only available for tableless forms).
trans-unit.target: In container per champs dal formular cun ina legenda opziunala (be disponibel per formulars senza tabella).

trans-unit.source: A single-line input field for a short or medium text.
trans-unit.target: In champ dad ina lingia per texts curts u mesauns.

trans-unit.source: A single-line input field for a password. Contao automatically adds a confirmation field.
trans-unit.target: In champ dad ina lingua per in pled-clav. Contao agiunta automaticamain in champ da confermar.

trans-unit.source: A multi-line input field for a medium or long text.
trans-unit.target: In champ da pliras lingias per endatar text mesaun u lung.

trans-unit.source: A single- or multi-line drop-down menu.
trans-unit.target: In menu drop-down dad ina u pliras lingias.

trans-unit.source: A list of multiple options from which one can be selected.
trans-unit.target: Ina glista da pliras opziuns da qualas be ina po vegnir tschernida.

trans-unit.source: A list of multiple options from which any can be selected.
trans-unit.target: Ina glista da diversas opziuns da qualas pliras pon vegnir tschernidas.

trans-unit.source: A single-line input field to upload a local file to the server.
trans-unit.target: In champ d'endataziun dad ina lingia per transferir ina datoteca locala sin il server

trans-unit.source: A single-line input field that is not visible in the form.
trans-unit.target: In champ d'endataziun dad ina lingia che n'è betg visibel en il formular.

trans-unit.source: A simple math question to verify that the form is being submitted by a human (CAPTCHA).
trans-unit.target: In quint simpel per verifitgar ch'il formular è vegnì emplenì dad in uman (CAPTCHA).

trans-unit.source: A button to submit the form.
trans-unit.target: In buttun per trametter il formular.

trans-unit.source: Please choose the type of field.
The field name is a unique name to identify the field.
trans-unit.target: Quest champ sto cuntegnair in num unic per identifitgar il champ.

trans-unit.source: The field label will be visible on the website, typically in front of or above the field.
trans-unit.target: La descripziun vegn ad esser visibla sin la pagina d'internet, tipicamain avant u sur il champ d'endataziun.

trans-unit.source: You can use HTML tags to format the text.
trans-unit.target: Ti pos utilisar tags HTML per formatar il text

trans-unit.source: You can modify the list of allowed HTML tags in the back end settings.
trans-unit.target: Ti pos modifitgar la glista dals tags HTML ch'èn lubids en la configuraziun dal back-end.

trans-unit.source: If JavaScript is disabled, make sure to save your changes before modifying the order.
trans-unit.target: Sche JavaScript è deactivà stos ti controllar che tias midadas èn memorisadas avant che ti midas la successiun.

trans-unit.source: The form will not submit if the field is empty.
trans-unit.target: Impussibel da trametter il formular sche quest champ è vid.

trans-unit.source: Validate the input against a regular expression.
trans-unit.target: Validar l'endataziun cun ina expressiun regulara.

trans-unit.source: Allows numeric characters, minus (-), full stop (.) and space ( ).
trans-unit.target: Lubescha caracters numerics, minus (-), puncts (.) e spazis ( ).

trans-unit.source: Allows alphabetic characters, minus (-), full stop (.) and space ( ).
trans-unit.target: Lubescha caracters alfabetics, minus (-), puncts (.) e spazis ( ).

trans-unit.source: Allows alphabetic and numeric characters, minus (-), full stop (.), underscore (_) and space ( ).
trans-unit.target: Lubescha caracters alfabetics e numerics, minus (-), puncts (.), sutstritg (_) e spazis ( ).

trans-unit.source: Allows everything except special characters which are usually encoded for security reasons (#/()<=>).
trans-unit.target: Lubescha tut auter che caracters che vegnan normalmain codads ord motivs da segirezza (#/()<=>).

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the input matches the global date format.
trans-unit.target: Controllescha sche l'endataziun correspunda al format global da datas.

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the input matches the global time format.
trans-unit.target: Controllescha sche l'endataziun correspunda al format global da temp.

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the input matches the global date and time format.
trans-unit.target: Controllescha sche l'endataziun correspunda al format global da data e temp.

trans-unit.source: Allows numeric characters, plus (+), minus (-), slash (/), parentheses () and space ( ).
trans-unit.target: Lubescha caracters numerics, plus (+), minus (-), stritg diagonal (/), parantesas (()) e segns vids ( ).

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the input is a valid e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: Controllescha sche l'endataziun è ina adressa dad e-mail formalmain valida.

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the input is a valid URL.
trans-unit.target: Controllescha sche l'endataziun è formalmain in URL valid.

trans-unit.source: Show this text as long as the field is empty (requires HTML5).
trans-unit.target: Mussar quest text sche il champ è vid (vegn be mussà en navigaturs che sustegnan HTML5).

trans-unit.source: Limit the field length to a certain number of characters (text) or bytes (file uploads).
trans-unit.target: imitescha la lunghezza dal champ ad in dumber da caracters (text) u bytes (transfers da datotecas).

trans-unit.source: The number of rows and columns of the textarea.
trans-unit.target: Il dumber da lingias e colonnas dal spazi da text.

trans-unit.source: Allow visitors to select more than one option.
trans-unit.target: Lubir als visitaders da tscherner dapli che mo ina opziun.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the size of the select box.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar la grondezza da la glista da selecziunar.

trans-unit.source: A comma separated list of valid file extensions.
trans-unit.target: Ina glista separada da commas dad extensiuns da datotecas lubidas.

trans-unit.source: Move the uploaded files to a folder on the server.
trans-unit.target: Spustar las datotecas transferidas en in ordinatur sin il server.

trans-unit.source: Please select the target folder from the files directory.
trans-unit.target: Tscherna la destinaziun da l'ordinatur da datotecas.

trans-unit.source: Store the file in the home directory if there is an authenticated user.
trans-unit.target: Memorisar la datoteca en l'ordinatur persunal sche l'utilisader è autentifitgà.

trans-unit.source: Add a numeric suffix to the new file if the file name already exists.
trans-unit.target: Agiuntar in suffix numeric a datotecas novas sch'il num da datoteca exista gia.

trans-unit.source: Please select the operation mode of the fieldset element.
trans-unit.target: Tscherna il modus da funcziun per l'element 'set da champs'

trans-unit.source: Marks the beginning of a fieldset and can contain a legend.
trans-unit.target: Marchescha il cumenzament dal set da champs e po cuntegnair ina legenda.

trans-unit.source: Marks the end of a fieldset.
trans-unit.target: Marchescha la fin dal set da champs.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter a default value for the field.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar ina valur da standard per il champ.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter one or more classes.
trans-unit.target: Qua pos ti endatar ina u pliras classas.

trans-unit.source: A form field can be focused by pressing the [ALT] or [CTRL] key and the access key simultaneously.
trans-unit.target: In champ da formular po vegnir focussà cun smatgar la tasta [ALT] u [CTRL] ed la tasta d'access en il medem mument.

trans-unit.source: The position of the form field in the tabbing order.
trans-unit.target: La posiziun dal champ da formular en la successiun da tabulatur.

trans-unit.source: Here you can enter the size of the upload field (size attribute).
Add a submit button next to the field to create a single line form.
trans-unit.target: Agiuntar in buttun da trametter sper il champ per far in formular dad ina lingia.

trans-unit.source: Please enter the label of the submit button.
trans-unit.target: Endatescha il text che vegn mussà sin il buttun da trametter.

trans-unit.source: Use an image submit button instead of the default one.
trans-unit.target: Utilisar in maletg sco buttun da trametter.

trans-unit.source: Please select an image from the files directory.
trans-unit.target: Tscherna in maletg en l'ordinatur da datotecas.

trans-unit.source: Show the details of field ID %s
trans-unit.target: Mussar ils detagls dal champ cun l'ID %s
Encollar suenter il champ cun l'ID %s
Agiuntar in nov champ suenter il champ cun l'ID %s

trans-unit.source: Toggle the visibility of field ID %s
trans-unit.target: Midar la visibilitad dal champ cun l'ID %s
